text: Reino Oscar Nori (February 26, 1913 - October 8, 1988) was an American football quarterback who played in the National Football League for the Brooklyn Dodgers and Chicago Bears from 1937 to 1938. ==References== Category:1913 births Category:1988 deaths Category:People from DeKalb, Illinois Category:players of American football from Illinois Category:American football quarterbacks Category:Brooklyn Dodgers (NFL) players Category:Chicago Bears players
title: Reino Nori
